200.description: Reward distribution for the round retrieved successfully.

status.description: Status code indicating the result of the operation.

message.description: Additional information or message about the response.

round.description: The round number for which the reward distribution is reported.

overallRewardsDistributed.description: The total rewards distributed in the given round.

rewardsBurnt.description: The amount of rewards burnt in the given round.

rewardsCommissionFees.description: The amount of rewards used for commission fees in the given round.

rewardsStakingSharing.description: The amount of rewards distributed for staking sharing in the given round.

400.description: An error occurred while retrieving the reward distribution.

status.description: Status code of the error response.
